MODE_ENQUEUE - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Add the songs at the end of the timeline, clearing random songs.
MODE_ENQUEUE_AS_NEXT - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Enqueues the result as next item(s) Pass the position in QueryTask.data.
MODE_ENQUEUE_ID_FIRST - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Like enqueue mode, but make the song with the given id play first by removing the songs before the song in the query and appending them to the end of the queue.
MODE_ENQUEUE_POS_FIRST - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Like enqueue mode, but make the song at the given position play first by removing the songs before the given position in the query and appending them to the end of the queue.
MODE_FLUSH_AND_PLAY_NEXT - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Clear the queue and add the songs after the current song.
MODE_PLAY - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Clear the timeline and use only the provided songs.
MODE_PLAY_ID_FIRST - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Like play mode, but make the song with the given id play first by removing the songs before the song in the query and appending them to the end of the queue.
MODE_PLAY_POS_FIRST - Static variable in class ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.SongTimeline
Like play mode, but make the song at the given position play first by removing the songs before the given position in the query and appending them to the end of the queue.
